element.name: Glasgow Coma Score-Qualifier
element.definition: Documentation of factors which make the GCS score more meaningful.
element.v3Comment: Definitions now based on the National Trauma Data Standard (NTDS).

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Initial GCS has legitimate values without interventions such as intubation and sedation

asserts.assert: When Glasgow Coma Score-Qualifier is "Initial GCS has legitimate values without interventions such as intubation and sedation", no other value should be recorded.
When Glasgow Coma Score-Qualifier has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When Glasgow Coma Score-Qualifier is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
When Glasgow Coma Score-Qualifier has a Not Value, no other value should be recorded.
